sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic and diced onion, cook until softened. 3. Stir in sliced mushrooms and cook until tender. 4. Add arborio rice and cook for 1-2. 5. Pour in white wine and cook until absorbed. 6. Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and tender. 7. Stir in grated parmesan cheese. 8. Season with salt and pepper. 9. Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Arborio Rice (1 cup), Mushrooms (200g, s</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Mushroom Risotto</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 10g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 50g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Slice mushrooms. 2. Dice onion. 3. Mince garlic.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b4ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
